docs.text:
MatNN - An Neural Network Framework for MATLAB


MatNN
 is a MATLAB framework for neural network training and testing. It aims to provide the similarity of 
Caffe
, and elastic workflow of 
MatConvNet
.


This toolbox requires 
MatConvNet
 to be installed in your system and added to your MATLAB path.


Features


MatNN
 provides some features you may familiar with 
Caffe
 or other CNN tools:
+ Weight Sharing
+ Multiple Losses
+ Custom data sampling algorithm
+ Custom layer with custom parameters/weights/loss/...
+ Multiple GPUs support


License


MatNN
 is under the Simplified BSD License.
If you use 
MatNN
 in your work, please refer to the this site 
MatNN
.

docs.title: License

docs.text:
Installation


Follow the steps to install 
MatNN
:




MatNN
 requires 
MatConvNet
 to be installed on your system, please install it first.


Download and unzip the source code to a directory you want, assume the path to this directory is 
MatNN
.


Run this command in Matlab to add 
MatNN
 to your Matlab path:
   
matlab
   addpath 
MatNN
;


It's done. Now you can use MatNN in your project!
docs.title: Installation
